metadata.title: CVE-2016-6211 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The User module in Drupal 7.x before 7.44 allows remote authenticated usersto gain privileges via vectors involving contributed or custom code thattriggers a rebuild of the user profile form.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
